item.title: Cybersecurity Home Lab: Part 1 - Introduction of Homelab
item.description: Starting my own cybersecurity home lab to learn, practice, and experiment with various tools and techniques. Join me as I explore the basics, set up virtual machines, and work on real-world cybersecurity scenarios without fear of messing up my personal data!

item.title: Git vs GitHub: Understanding the Dynamic Duo of Version Control
item.description: A comprehensive comparison between Git and GitHub, explaining how they work together to manage version control in software development. Explore their key differences, features, and collaboration capabilities.
